title: Inference procedure for blood pressure proportion

content.question: A national health study reported that the proportion of students with elevated blood pressure is 0.15. The principal of a local high school believes that the proportion of students in the school with elevated blood pressure is greater than 0.15. If a large random sample is used, which of the following is the most appropriate test to investigate the principalâ€™s belief?

A chi-square test for homogeneity of proportions
